content:
System.ServiceModel.Diagnostics Namespace

Definition

The System.ServiceModel.Diagnostics namespace contains an enumeration that is used to configure performance counters for diagnostics purposes.

In this Article

Enums

PerformanceCounterScope

Specifies whether performance counters for the assembly are enabled.
